name: Deep Love パオの物語
summary: Being abandoned by his owners, having his mother die of starvation, a puppy who suffered lifelong separation from his siblings wandered around the city. Meeting and parting with kind people, experiencing brutal treatment from unjust people. Pao, who learned to live within the harshness of reality, awaits even more ordeals...
info:
• 册数: 2
  • 话数: 11
  • 原作: Yoshi
  • 出版社: *
  • 发售日: 2005
  • 作画: 黒沢明世
